meanings.sent1: The teacher's annotative remarks helped the students understand the complex text.
meanings.sent2: She is known for her annotative approach to literature, adding valuable insights to each paragraph.
meanings.sent3: The annotative cat left little notes around the house, explaining its daily activities.
meanings.sent4: His annotative style of painting transformed the canvas into a storytelling masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The annotative map guided travelers with detailed explanations of each landmark.

meanings.sent1: The annotative book was filled with colorful sticky notes marking important pages.
meanings.sent2: Her annotative handwriting made it easy to follow her thoughts throughout the margins.
meanings.sent3: The annotative squirrel left tiny notes on the trees, reminding others of its nut hiding spots.
meanings.sent4: The annotative sky was like a canvas painted with fluffy clouds and bright stars.
meanings.sent5: His annotative behavior in class made him stand out as a diligent student.
